description: Modifies the original Settings class provided by the user

client_cache_capacity.description: Maximum number of entries to store in the cache. Older entries are evicted once this limit is reached.
client_cache_capacity.title: Client Cache Capacity

client_cache_ttl.description: Number of seconds after which a stored response is considered stale.
client_cache_ttl.title: Client Cache Ttl

client_cacheable_methods.description: HTTP methods for which responses are allowed to be cached.
client_cacheable_methods.title: Client Cacheable Methods

client_cacheable_status_codes.description: HTTP response status code for which responses are allowed to be cached.
client_cacheable_status_codes.title: Client Cacheable Status Codes

client_exponential_backoff_max.description: Maximum number of seconds to wait between retries when using exponential backoff retry strategies. The client timeout might need to be adjusted accordingly.
client_exponential_backoff_max.title: Client Exponential Backoff Max

client_num_retries.description: Number of times to retry failed API calls.
client_num_retries.title: Client Num Retries

client_retry_status_codes.description: List of status codes that should trigger retrying a request.
client_retry_status_codes.title: Client Retry Status Codes

client_reraise_from_retry_error.description: Specifies if the exception wrapped in the final RetryError is reraised or the RetryError is returned as is.
client_reraise_from_retry_error.title: Client Reraise From Retry Error

per_request_jitter.description: Max amount of jitter (in seconds) to add to each request.
per_request_jitter.title: Per Request Jitter

retry_after_applicable_for_num_requests.description: Amount of requests after which the stored delay from a 429 response is ignored again. Can be useful to adjust if concurrent requests are fired in quick succession.
retry_after_applicable_for_num_requests.title: Retry After Applicable For Num Requests

max_concurrent_downloads.description: Number of parallel download tasks for file parts.
max_concurrent_downloads.title: Max Concurrent Downloads

max_wait_time.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait before quitting without a download.
max_wait_time.title: Max Wait Time

part_size.description: The part size to use for download.
part_size.title: Part Size

wkvs_api_url.description: URL to the root of the WKVS API. Should start with https://
wkvs_api_url.title: Wkvs Api Url

title: ModSettings
